## Dictionaries in Python

### To create a dictionary
can using the function dict()
Can also specify the name of the dictionary you're creating = {}

### To return various items from the dictionary once entered
DictionaryName.key() = returns the keys in the dictionary
DictionaryName.value() = returns the values in the dictionary
DictionaryName.items() = returns the both keys and values

len() on a dictinary class will return the number of items in the dictionary

Note since dictionary use hashkey the order is not prodictable and will not be in the same order entered
